setattribute.xpath: //recipe[(contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3') or contains(@name, 'armor') or contains(@name, 'Battery'))]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='CraftingIngredientCount']
setattribute.name: level

setattribute.xpath: //recipe[(contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3') or contains(@name, 'armor') or contains(@name, 'Battery'))]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='CraftingIngredientCount']
setattribute.name: value

setattribute.xpath: //recipe[@name='meleeToolRepairT1ClawHammer' or @name='meleeToolAxeT1IronFireaxe' or @name='meleeToolAxeT2SteelAxe' or @name='meleeToolShovelT2SteelShovel' or @name='meleeToolShovelT1IronShovel' or @name='meleeToolPickT2SteelPickaxe' or @name='meleeToolPickT1IronPickaxe']
setattribute.name: tags

setattribute.xpath: //recipe[@name='foodGumboStew' or @name='foodShepardsPie' or @name='foodSpaghetti' or @name='foodTunaFishGravyToast' or @name='drinkJarGrandpasMoonshine' or @name='drinkJarGrandpasAwesomeSauce' or @name='drinkJarGrandpasLearningElixir']
setattribute.name: craft_area

setattribute.xpath: //recipe[@name='medicalFirstAidKit' or @name='drugSteroids' or @name='drugFortBites' or @name='drugRecog' or (contains(@name, 'drugAntibiotics') and not(contains(@craft_area, 'campfire')))]
setattribute.name: craft_area

setattribute.xpath: //recipe[@name='ammoGasCanBundle' or @name='vehicleMotorcycleChassis' or @name='vehicleMotorcycleHandlebars' or @name='vehicle4x4TruckChassis' or @name='vehicle4x4TruckAccessories' or @name='vehicle4x4TruckPlaceable' or @name='vehicleMotorcyclePlaceable']
setattribute.name: craft_area
